name: Alpha
description:
A UI Kit providing example components and styles.


Changelog

June 13, 2022

  • Added boolean left icon prop to Input
  • Fixed prop conflict in Checkbox component
  • Added Green shade color styles
  • Added tasks icon to the solid set
  • Added mail icon to the outline set


June 10, 2022

  • Adjusted shared focus style
  • Adjusted Button rest text color for better accessibility
  • Drafted new Form Field and Input properties


May 31, 2022

  • Added new icons
  • Added initial styles
  • Drafted Button component with new props
